title: Haven't earned a key fragment for over 2 months.
body:
Hi, I've played well over 50 games in the last 2 months and have won quite alot of them. I however have not earned a single key fragment in any of these games, even when I go 14-0 on Vi or something. I've heard about for the rotation for them works, and people talk about it as a "28 day shift". I'm pretty sure this is not included in that shift.

Anyone care to reply?

replies.body: I looked into this for you, and it's not a result of a bug or anything like that.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and we can offer more context individually through there.  See you there!

me too. op please share the info
{{item:3348}} {{item:3348}}
